Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.ulin.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.ulin.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements JarImpler
Class, that can generate Implementation of given class

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Create a .jar file.

      Generate .jar file from 1 argument .java file, and write it to 2 argument path.

      Parameters:
      args - argument for write .jar file.

    • writeToFile

      private static void writeToFile(BufferedWriter writer, String write) throws IOException
      Writes a given string to a file using Unicode escape sequences.

      Each character in the input string is converted to its Unicode escape sequence before being written to the file.

      Parameters:
      writer - the writer used to write to the file.
      write - the string to be written.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing to the file.

    • getDefaultValue

      private static String getDefaultValue(Class<?> rType)
      Return the default value for a given type.

      The default value is determined as follows:

      • void return empty string ""
      • boolean return "false"
      • Other primitive types return "0"
      • Reference types return "null"
      Parameters:
      rType - the returned type, fow that need get a default value.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the default value.

    • getArgs

      private static String getArgs(Class<?>[] params, boolean isVararg)
      Generate the string for method arguments.

      If no one arguments, then return an empty string.

      Parameters:
      params - array of arguments types.
      isVararg - trye id last argument is vararg, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      a formated separated string, that contains the all arguments. Arguments will separated ", " and i-th argument will have name "arg" + i.

    • getErrors

      private static String getErrors(Class<?>[] errors)
      Generate the string for throws errors.

      If the is empty, then return empty string.

      Parameters:
      errors - array of exception types.
      Returns:
      a formated strings start with " throws " followed by a ", " separated list of exceptions or an empty string, if errors is empty.

    • getHeader

      private static String getHeader(String name, Class<?>[] args, boolean isVarargs, Class<?>[] errors) throws ImplerException
      Generate the header for method or constructor.

      The generated header include the method or constructor name, parameter list, and declared exceptions. If any parameter has a private type, an exception is thrown.

      Parameters:
      name - name of the header.
      args - arguments of the header.
      isVarargs - true if last argument is varargs, false otherwise.
      errors - errors, that can throw the header
      Returns:
      value is a string, that contains a header
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if provided method cannot be generated.

    • writeMethod

      private static void writeMethod(Method method, Set<String> set, BufferedWriter writer) throws ImplerException, IOException
      Generate the given method.

      Method returned the default value of the returned type. If method is private, it is skipped. If method with same signature exists in set, it will skip.

      Parameters:
      method - method of superclass to be implemented.
      set - set of methods signatures.
      writer - writer to output generated code.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if provided method cannot be generated.
      IOException - when an I/O errors occurs.

    • writeMethods

      private static void writeMethods(Class<?> aClass, BufferedWriter writer, Set<String> set, Function<Class<?>,Method[]> getMethods) throws IOException, ImplerException
      Generate the method for the given class.

      If some constructors exist in set, write nothing. If some methods have private arguments or returned type, throw an exception.

      Parameters:
      aClass - token those methods should be implemented.
      writer - writer to output generated code.
      set - set with method headers.
      getMethods - function, what from class return a methods.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation is not possible.
      IOException - when an I/O errors occurs.

    • methodHandler

      private static void methodHandler(Class<?> aClass, BufferedWriter writer) throws IOException, ImplerException
      Generate the method for the given class ant his superclasses.

      If some methods have private arguments or returned type, throw an exception.

      Parameters:
      aClass - token those methods should be implemented.
      writer - writer to output generated code.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation is not possible.
      IOException - when an I/O errors occurs.

    • writeConstructor

      private static boolean writeConstructor(String className, Constructor<?> constructor, BufferedWriter writer) throws IOException
      Generate the given constructor.

      Constructor calls the superclass constructor with the same parameters. If constructor is private, it is skipped.

      Parameters:
      className - name the generated implementation class.
      constructor - constructor of the superclass to be implemented.
      writer - writer to output generated code.
      Returns:
      true if the constructor write successfully, false if it was skipped.
      Throws:
      IOException - when an I/O errors occurs.

    • writeConstructors

      private static void writeConstructors(Class<?> aClass, BufferedWriter writer) throws IOException, ImplerException
      Generate the constructors for the given class, or nothing, if interface.

      If not private constructor not exists, throws an exception.

      Parameters:
      aClass - token those constructors should be implemented.
      writer - writer to output generated code.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation is not possible.
      IOException - when an I/O errors occurs.

    • tryImplement

      private static void tryImplement(Class<?> aClass) throws ImplerException
      Check what the given class or interface can be implemented.

      Throws an exception if the class is final, sealed, private, enum, record, or lacks accessible constructors.

      Parameters:
      aClass - token class to check.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation is not possible.

    • getPackageName

      private static String getPackageName(Class<?> aClass) throws ImplerException
      Return a string, that contains a package name.
      Parameters:
      aClass - token, which package need to get.
      Returns:
      a formated string, start with "package ", that contains a full code for package.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if package start with java.

    • getClassSignature

      private static String getClassSignature(Class<?> aClass)
      Return a string, that contains a class signature.
      Parameters:
      aClass - token, which signature need to get.
      Returns:
      a formated string, start with "public class ", that contains a full code for header.

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> aClass, Path path) throws ImplerException
      Produces .java file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name will have the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      aClass - type token to create implementation for.
      path - target .java file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> aClass, Path path) throws ImplerException
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name will have the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      aClass - type token to create implementation for.
      path - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • compile

      private static void compile(Class<?> aClass, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Compile the previously generated implementation of the given class or interface.

      Used the system Java compiler to generate .class file from the .java file.

      Parameters:
      aClass - type token whose implementation should be compiled.
      root - root directory where the generated .java file is located.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when .class file cannot be generated.

    • getFullPath

      private static Path getFullPath(Class<?> aClass, String extension)
      Return a Path to token.

      Return the Path to given token with "Impl." + extension suffix.

      Parameters:
      aClass - token, which path need to get.
      extension - extension of file.
      Returns:
      a Path to given token.

    • createJar

      private static void createJar(Path root, Path classFile, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Creates a .jar file contained the compiled implementation of the given class or interface

      The generated JAR includes the compiled Impl class and a manifest.

      Parameters:
      root - root directory where .class file is located.
      classFile - path to compiled .class file.
      jarFile - root directory where .jar file will be located.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when .jar cannot be generated.
